name: Evostock-2017
tagline: EVO STAR, EVOSTOCK 2016 - 2017 is the Leading European Event on Bio-Inspired Computation. April 2017
body:
# Evostock-2017
EVO STAR, EVOSTOCK 2016 - 2017 is the Leading European Event on Bio-Inspired Computation. April 2017 .Pilot project: the development of online tools for beginning teachers and their mentors. 
https://etendering.ted.europa.eu/cft/cft-display.html?cftId=1625

The overall objective of this contract is to contribute to the improvement of European-level policy development in education and training. The specific objective of this contract is to increase self-efficacy of beginning teachers to become effective professionals. It will involve the development of online peer networks for (a) beginning teachers and (b) their mentors, as well as (c) an online professional development course for mentors of student school teachers.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
